Exaggerate: The claim of the image showing the Pakistani plane moments before the crash in Karachi in May 2020 is an exaggeration because the image is actually a screenshot from a flight simulator video and not a real photograph of the crash.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as the image used in the claim is not authentic and does not provide any evidence of the actual crash.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image is genuine and portrays the actual crash, which is a problematic assumption given that it is a screenshot from a flight simulator video.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image is not a real photograph of the crash but a simulated screenshot from a flight simulator video.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists for the image, which is that it is a screenshot from a flight simulator video and not a real photograph of the crash.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting an inaccurate representation of the crash and misleads viewers about the authenticity of the image.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the provided claim.
